parent1.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the sum of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour and the square root of the reciprocal of the edge count to guide the search towards a better solution.

offspring.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the sum of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour and the logarithm of the reciprocal of the edge count to guide the search towards a better solution.
